Arnab Goswami: s misattribution of a quote to Dr B.R. Ambedkar: The expert's verdict highlights that Arnab Goswami wrongly attributed a quote about the slogan "Bharat Mata Ki Jai" to Dr B.R. Ambedkar. The quote was actually from a book written by Dr Raj Kumar.
Mispronunciation of Mohandas Karamchand: s name: During the debate, Arnab Goswami mispronounced the name of Mahatma Gandhi while trying to highlight his association with the Bharat Mata temple in Varanasi. This aspect was employed to verify the authenticity of the claim.
Accusation of appropriating Ambedkar: Goswami accused Prof Rao of "appropriating Ambedkar" when he dismissed the slogan "Bharat Mata Ki Jai" as jingoistic. This aspect was used to analyze the claim and its authenticity.
Questioning Gandhi: s association with RSS: Goswami posed a question to Prof Visweswara Rao, asking if Mahatma Gandhi was a member of the RSS (Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh). This aspect was used to examine the argument presented during the debate.
